title: Name That Genre
summary: Embedding + CNN model that classifies a song's genre by its lyrics. Achieves an accuracy of 64% and F1 scores of up to 0.79

title: PokeType
summary: Convolutional neural network classifying a pokemon's primary type based on its sprite image

title: Beat
summary: Multiplayer music mobile game that lets players score by selecting a song that matches the beat of the previous song

title: Shuffle
summary: Party app allowing users to submit song preferences through a mobile app to help the host play more popular songs
